totalcross.ui.event

Class MouseEvent

  • totalcross.lang.Object
    • totalcross.ui.event.Event<PenListener>
      • totalcross.ui.event.PenEvent
        • totalcross.ui.event.MouseEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    totalcross.lang.Cloneable

    public class MouseEvent
extends PenEvent
    MouseEvent is a mouse move, in a control or out a control events. Only occurs on devices with a mouse, like Windows 32 and Linux desktop.
    Since:
    TotalCross 1.27

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class totalcross.ui.event.Event
